conbody.p: This subpart prescribes policies and procedures for establishing and using basic agreements and basic ordering agreements. (See 13.303 for blanket purchase agreements (BPAâ€™s) and see 35.015 (b) for additional coverage of basic agreements with educational institutions and nonprofit organizations.)
